import React, { useContext } from 'react' import diomond from '../diomond.png' import mycontext from '../Context/Createcontext' function Showuserdata(props) { const {DeleteNote}=useContext(mycontext) const {note}=props return (
{/* */}

{note.date}

price :{note.price}

work :{note.work}
Dailywork : {note.dailywork}
Total: {note.reduce((curr,pre)=>{ return curr+pre })}
) } export default Showuserdata
